entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
